articles.title: KP Med Analytics Insights
articles.contents:
Building a website
          
          
          Home
          About

              KP Med Analytics Insights

            Bio
            I love helping medical scientists and researchers with
            data analysis using R and Python. My passion is training and
            statistical analysis of medical data. I build statistical
            software such as dashboards for easier data visualization
            and analysis. My area of focus is applying data
            science to academic projects. I create value for medical
            scientists and students by enriching their projects with up
            to date biostatistical methods and delivering statistical
            analysis to bring about insights in their projects. I enjoy
            learning, working with fellow medical scientists,
            researchers and students, and making actionable plans with
            data.
            
            
            Education
            University of Cape Town | Cape Town,
            RSA
            MSc. in Medical Virology | 2019 - 2021
            University of Cape Town | Cape Town,
            RSA
            BMedSc(Hon). Infectious Disease and Immunology | 2018
            Stellenbosch University | Cape Town,
            RSA
            BMedSc(Hon). Fine Needle Aspiration and Gynaecological
            Cytology | 2016
            Nelson Mandela University |
            Gqheberha/PE, RSA
            BSc. Medical Science | 2006 - 2010
            
            
            Experience
            KP Med Analytics Insights (Pty) Ltd |
            Founder | January 2020 - Present
            National Health Laboratory Service
            (NHLS) | Medical Scientist | March 2021 -
            Present
            UCT Institute of Infectious Disease and Molecular
            Medicine | Medical Scientist | Feb 2018 -
            Present
            National Health Laboratory Service
            (NHLS) | Cytologist | Dec 2010 - Present
            National Health Laboratory Service
            (NHLS) | Biostatistician | Dec 2010 - Present
            National Health Laboratory Service
            (NHLS) | Specialist Trainer | Apr 2012 - Jan
            2018
            National Health Laboratory Service
            (NHLS) | Supervisor: Cytopathology | 2015
            wowchemy/starter-hugo-academic
            blogdown::new_site(theme =
            “wowchemy/starter-hugo-academic”)
